analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/15/0x6ada673d66c8ec58daa12b0b88d800b6257b2b8f.sol:
	Contract TFXToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/15/0x6ada673d66c8ec58daa12b0b88d800b6257b2b8f.sol#204-205)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/15/0x6ada673d66c8ec58daa12b0b88d800b6257b2b8f.sol#73-74) is not in mixedCase
